channel.title: .svn on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in .svn on My New Hugo Site

item.title: SVN commands
item.description: Adding all un-versioned files under the current directory to the SVN: command 1: svn add `svn status .|grep "^?"|awk '{print $2}'` command 2: svn add . --force Adding specific files to subversion: svn add file1 file2 folder1 path/to/folder2 Commit specific folder in svn: svn ci -m "commit message" file1 file2 folder1 path/to/folder2 Publish Date: 2014-10-12
